comment._content: London Bridge from the south side of the river Thames

comment.author: 45367154@N06
comment._content: This is the bridge that is now at Lake Havasu, Arizona.

comment.author: 16849645@N00
comment._content: I used to walk this way to work after exiting London Bridge Station. Mind you this was by using the bridge that replaced the one shown above.

comment.author: 25453448@N02
comment._content: The two nearer buildings on each side of the bridge are still there, but this bridge has long since been replaced, and the rest of this view ('the City') has been transformed almost beyond recognition by assorted banking and business high-rise steel-and-glass.
